profile: An experienced supermarket manager turned software developer who can build applications from the ground up using an array of technologies. I am passionate about software architecture and design, and I am keen to continue expanding my knowledge, learning about new technologies and languages. I am tuned to the business need to deliver high quality solutions and applications using Agile methodology. Coupled with my previous experience I feel I will be an asset to any organisation looking to employ a junior developer.
